info.title: Ampairs API
info.description: Comprehensive business management system providing authentication, customer management, product/inventory management, order processing, and invoice generation

post.description: Verify the OTP sent to the phone number and complete the authentication process. Returns JWT access and refresh tokens.
Use refresh token to obtain a new access token. This endpoint is device-specific.
Logout from the current device session. Other device sessions remain active.
Logout from all device sessions associated with the authenticated user.

data.message: Logged out from all devices successfully

post.description: Start the authentication process by sending OTP to the provided phone number. This endpoint supports reCAPTCHA validation and handles device identification for multi-device authentication.

error.message: Rate limit exceeded. Try again later.
error.details: You can only make 1 request per 20 seconds

post.description: Logout from a specific device session by device ID. The current device session and other device sessions remain active.

404.description: Device not found or not associated with user

get.description: Check the status of an authentication session by session ID
Retrieve all active device sessions for the authenticated user with device information and activity status.
